attributes.action: allow tax payers to opt out of allowing MP's to use our money for expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My taxes could be better utilised rather than paying for MP's expences including second home allowances, paying their council tax, food bills etc. scrap the whole expenses scheme, including second home allowances and use the savings to improve conditions for our Armed Forces, NHS and Police Forces

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
